task_description: Facing the building to your East (approx. 101°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the full height of the building to estimate it, so I will tilt my view upwards to see the roof.
I can see the top of the building, but I need to see the base to estimate the full height, so I will look down.

I have now seen the top and the bottom of the building; it appears to be about 12 stories high, and assuming a standard floor height of 3.5 to 4 meters per story, I estimate the total height to be around 45 meters.
